process.title: STRATEGY
process.desc: We brainstorm your creative concept, outline and schedule each step of the production process, and collect the details we need to get started.

process.title: PRE-PRODUCTION
process.desc: We cast the perfect talent, scout locations, create call sheets, script and storyboard your video. and prepare other elements of your project for produciton.

process.title: PRODUCTION
process.desc: We capture footage, manage photography, and handle all creww and art direction from start to finish.

process.title: POST-PRODUCTION
process.desc: We edit your footage, handle color and sound correction, create graphics and animation, and more to bring your story to life.
